item.title: Setting Up a Kubernetes Cluster on GKE Using Terraform
item.description: Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) is one of the most popular managed Kubernetes platforms, offering powerful scalability and simplicity for developers and operators. Using Terraform, we can automate and streamline the provisioning of GKE clusters. In this guide, weâ€™ll use the GKE Terraform Module to stand up a Kubernetes cluster.
